thread.title: Nike Savagely Trolls Adidas About Their Island Giveaway After John Ross Breaks Combine Record Wearing Nike Shoes
thread.title_full: Nike Savagely Trolls Adidas About Their Island Giveaway After John Ross Breaks Combine Record Wearing Nike Shoes

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Nike Savagely Trolls Adidas About Their Island Giveaway After John Ross Breaks Combine Record Wearing Nike Shoes
text:
Adidas pulled out all the stops in trying to lure NFL prospects to wear their shoe on combine. Adidas even went as far as to offer anyone at the combine who broke Chris Johnson’s 40-yard dash their very own island. 
Unfortunately for Adidas, John Ross didn’t want an island and proceeded to break Johnson’s record wearing Nike shoes.
Nike instantly signed Ross to a shoe contract and trolled Adidas in the process. 
There's only one option when you want to go 4.2. @WatchJRoss 
The Nike Vapor 4.2 #NFLCombine https://t.co/oczSxqqWoA pic.twitter.com/S453ZNe03O 
— Nike Football (@usnikefootball) March 4, 2017 
On an island all by yourself. 
Record. Broken. ⏱ 
Welcome to the family, @WatchJRoss https://t.co/RNcMZIwj66 
— Nike Football (@usnikefootball) March 4, 2017 

Take that L, Adidas.
